Class w3c.amaya.HTTPThreadPool

public class HTTPThreadPool
extends Object
This class provides a pool of threads running the HTTP requests

NbThreads
threadgroup
Threads

HTTPThreadPool()

Initialize()
create a Thread group and allocate a few server threads within it.
Kill(int)
Kill : kill one of the treads and restart a new one
Kill(Thread)
Kill : kill one of the treads and restart a new one
Stop()
Stop : kill all the server threads.
